channel.title: Spamty Blog
channel.description: We will inform you here about everything new about Spamty.eu.

item.title: Spamty.eu Update
item.description:
The Spamty Website was updated. It has a slightly different look and a new language.

The website is now available in English, German, French and Spanish. Unfortunately my french and spanish is not very good, so there might be some/many misstakes in the translation.

Furthermore there is now a contact form available.

item.title: Powered by Jekyll
item.description:
This blog and the API documentation were updated. We are now using Jekyll - a static website generator - which is pretty cool.

Furthermore both are hosted by GitHub Pages <3

item.title: API Version 4
item.description:
The first functions of the new API version 4 are online.

You can use it to create a short url and to view a link from a short url. More to come soon…

Changelog

  • You now have to authenticate with an additional username to your API key and the API requests are logged.
  • Furthermore the API now uses HTTPS only.

item.title: New API documentation
item.description:
I published the new API documentation for spamty.eu. It is powered by Dokuwiki.

Furthermore we introduced a new API method to shorten a link with the URL shortener 3q3.de.

item.title: New Privacy Policy
item.description:
I’ve updated our privacy policy. It contains now detailed explanations about how data is collected, stored and (not) shared.

Furthermore the privacy policy site and the legal notice got a new colorful design.

item.title: Update on version 3
item.description:
We have updated our System to version 3.

Spamty Links are now shorter.

The API is not available yet.

item.title: Multilingual Spamty
item.description:
I’m currently working on a multilingual website for spamty. The English version is nearly finished. Then I will start translating it into German.

Please contact me if you could help translating the website into French, Spanish or any other language.

item.title: Merry Christmas
item.description: I wish you all a merry christmas and a happy new year.

item.title: New Spamty blog
item.description: This is the new Spamty Weblog. Here we will keep you up to date about changes, bugfixes, … on Spamty.eu.
